title: Special Episode: Can $2 Trillion Flatten the Unemployment Curve?
description: As a record 3.28 million workers file for unemployment, our Chief U.S. Economist and Chief U.S. Public Policy researcher weigh potential effects from the fiscal package now before Congress.
